de.hpi.bpt.chimera.jcore.flowbehaviors

Class ExclusiveGatewaySplitBehavior

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hpi.bpt.chimera.jcore.flowbehaviors.AbstractOutgoingBehavior
      • de.hpi.bpt.chimera.jcore.flowbehaviors.AbstractParallelOutgoingBehavior
        • de.hpi.bpt.chimera.jcore.flowbehaviors.ExclusiveGatewaySplitBehavior

  • public class ExclusiveGatewaySplitBehavior
extends AbstractParallelOutgoingBehavior
    This class deals with the split behavior of exclusive gateways.

      • createFollowingNodeInstance

        protected AbstractControlNodeInstance createFollowingNodeInstance(int controlNodeId)
        Description copied from class: AbstractParallelOutgoingBehavior
        Scans for the passed controlnode id in the currently registered instances in the scenario instance. If it is present the controlNodeInstance will be returned if it's not an activity instance or terminated. Else a new control node will created.
        Overrides:
        createFollowingNodeInstance in class AbstractParallelOutgoingBehavior
        Parameters:
        controlNodeId - This is the database id from the control node instance.
        Returns:
        the created control node instance.

      • checkTermination

        public boolean checkTermination(int controlNodeId)
        Checks if the gateway can terminate (because the given control node has changed his state).
        Parameters:
        controlNodeId - The id of the control node.
        Returns:
        True if the gateway can terminate. false if not.
